data.title: Robin Wright, Clément Giraudet file for divorce, look to go separate ways
data.meta_description: After a four-year marriage, Robin Wright and Clément Giraudet have filed for divorce. In the four-year marriage, the couple did not have kids.
data.text:
Synopsis

After a four-year marriage, Robin Wright and Clément Giraudet have filed for divorce. In the four-year marriage, the couple did not have kids.

Robin Wright and Clément Giraudet have decided to go separate ways. The couple has filed for divorce. The acclaimed American actor, who is 56 years old now, announced on Thursday that she was filing for divorce from her husband, Clément Giraudet, after four years of marriage.

In the filing, Wright designated July 31 as the date of separation. The incompatibility issues have been mentioned in the filing as the reason for the divorce.

Clement, a Saint Laurent executive, is Robin Wright's husband currently. In the four-year marriage, the couple did not have kids. All assets are each party's property, according to Robin's citation of the post-nuptial agreement between the couple.

According to reports, Wright has also marked the box that prevents the court from giving any of them spousal support. The Disco Queen, also known as Laura Wasser, is Robin's divorce attorney.

Robin Wright's Life

The couple started dating in 2017, and in August of the same year, they privately wed in France. On the set of the NBC serial drama "Santa Barbara," Wright met and got married to her first husband, the late Dane Witherspoon.

After several years of occasional dating, Robin and Sean Penn decided to get married in 1996. They have two children, namely, son Hopper Jack and daughter Dylan Frances. The 14-year marriage of Robin and Sean came to an end in 2010. Now, Wright is going to take divorce for the third time.

Robin Wright and Clément Giraudet's Relationship

Clément Giraudet and Robin Wright reportedly first interacted at the 2017 Paris Saint Laurent fashion show. When their relationship first began is still a mystery.

Other stories, though, suggest that their romance may have begun quite later. Page Six revealed that they had been seen together in California.

In 2018, Wright wed her partner at La Roche-sur-le-Buis, France, who was 18 years younger than her. Their wedding ceremony photographs were kept private. Dylan Penn did, however, post a few pictures on her Instagram account.

FAQ

What is the age difference between Robin Wright and Clement Giraudet?

The couple has an 18-year age gap. Clément is 37 years old while Robin is 55.

When did Robin Wright and Clement Giraudet start dating?

The couple started dating in 2017.
